column1: * 1950 - J.R.R. Tolkien returns from a stay at Michael Tolkiens cottage where he made some final revisions to The Lord of the Rings (see Letter 134).
* 1951 - First day of the Congrès Internationale de Philologie Moderne at the wikipedia:University of Liège
column2: a conference in which J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the paper "Middle English Losenger (essay)".

column1: * 1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien wins the The Bookseller
* 2007 - From Mind to Mind is published.
* 2010 - Bulgarian Tolkien Societys 6th Tolkien-Fest in wikipedia:Sofia.
* 2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online goes free-to-play for the general public in North America.
* 2015 - Oxonmoot 2015 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
* 2016 - Oxonmoot 2016 at http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antonys College.
